mapper.select: SELECT no, title, content, author, datafile, resdate, visited FROM board
SELECT no, title, content, author, datafile, resdate, visited FROM board WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, author, datafile, resdate, visited) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{author}, #{datafile}, #{resdate}, #{visited})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET visited = visited + 1 WHERE no = #{no}
